vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with GSR Andrade Architects, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the Centennial Building Improvements Project located at 1001 Washington Street in Fair Park - Not to exceed $472,640.00 - Financing: Fair Park Improvements (C) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
